description: Test JoinNode sharing with incremental conditions - validates that rules with additional conditions share common JoinNodes

expected_action_details.description: All User-Order pairs matching u.id == o.user_id

expected_network_structure.description: Should have 1 shared JoinNode for the common join condition u.id == o.user_id
expected_network_structure.note: Alpha conditions (o.amount > 100, u.status == 'vip') are handled by separate AlphaNodes
